front.title: IS-IS & OSPF extension for 5G Edge Computing Service

abstract.t: This draft describes an IS-IS and OSPF extension for routers to advertise the running status and environment (Site-Cost) for the directly attached 5G Edge Computing servers. Routers in the 5G Local Data Network can use the Site-Cost and the network condition to optimize forwarding flows from UEs. The goal is to improve latency and performance for 5G Edge Computing services.
